review.comment: Great options to choose from, designs and quality is spot on. Moon really helped tweak the design to our colour scheme. Outfit is really well made and looks incredible.  Ejaaz helped tweak fit and advised how to wear on the day. They only do weekend appointments so make sure to order in plenty of time.

Excellent service by Ejaaz! 100% recommend this place. I found unique outfits here and very good quality.
Fittings and service second to none.
Will always use Sherwani King in the future. 👌🏻😀

I have currently been using the bespoke wedding outfit service with Sherwani King over the last 6+ months to get my entire wedding outfit sorted, specifically with Ejaaz in the London branch.

Prior to this I had spent countless hours visiting known established fashion stores in Southall, Wembley and Ilford. Only to find lackluster bland designs and awful customer service with their main focus only being on bridal fashion and outdated men’s designs.

After my first consultation at Sherwani King, I was incredibly impressed with Ejaaz’s eye for detail and knowledge of men's wedding attire, all complimented by the unique sherwani pieces and accessories they have.

I would heavily recommend all grooms to visit Sherwani King for a bespoke consultation as I believe there is currently nothing like this that exists in the men’s Asian wedding scene when it comes to attire.

You have a wide a range of choices, 1:1 sessions (unlike the shops mentioned above), Complete control of creative direction with the pieces, fast turnover on the outfits and accessories, one stop shop for accessories as well which saves times shopping in multiple places i.e. shoes, ceremonial sword, necklaces etc. Even when it came to some slight measurement changes, Ejaaz was more than accommodating in resizing the pieces to match the new measurements. Also you a constant line of communication to ask any questions directly, you are not left in the dark.

Raj

The guys at sherwani king were great. They listened and helped me get the look I really wanted and went above and beyond sorting out some of the smaller pieces. Great choice of sherwanis and they can customise pretty much anything. 100% recommend!

From start to finish a genuinely superb service!
As a member of the LGBTQIA+ Community I was hesitant about finding a sherwani and had quite a difficult time in doing so.

Ejaaz was kind, welcoming and genuinely has the creative eye one would expect from a famous fashion house! He helped me design and curate the perfect wedding outfit and all at such a fair price you couldn’t even grumble!

If you’re looking for any suit/sherwani for any occasion I can absolutely recommend Ejaaz and Shewani Kings! You’d be silly not to use them!

I will be back for our winter ball attire and summer garden gala outfits too! Customer for
Life!

Thanks again Ejaaz

Best wishes

Mr Damon Butcher
Services was excellent. Ejaz is very professional and he did great. I was little late and wanted my sherwani in tight deadline but he done a great job. I recommend them 100%. Thanks Moon and Ejaz!

Sherwani king is at the top of its game! The Sherwani’s and Suits are so unique! Had both my morning suit for my wedding and sherwani designed and created by Sherwani King and they delivered the exact vision! Amazing customer service! thank you once again for making my wedding special as a groom!!

I came to Sherwani King looking for my reception outfit for my wedding and the team of Moon and Ejaaz were so welcoming, encouraging and supportive and helped me choose a tux that I never thought I’d go for! Great service, great customer support and I’m very happy with the final product! Definitely recommend Sherwani king for wedding attire!

Thanks

Milin

After searching countless stores for Asian groomswear, I came across Sherwani King and immediately realised it's in a league of its own.

The quality of the Sherwanis is far superior to its competitors and has a level of detail befitting the company name.

Ejaaz provided a great service with 1:1 slots and he ensured any alterations were dealt with promptly ahead of my big day.

I'd highly recommend Sherwani King.
Great clothes and service. Fully customisable and the fit is great. Moon and his team are very friendly and helpful. Highly recommend!

I booked myself in for a tuxedo fitting at Sherwani King London last week, after a few of my friends from Birmingham, who are their regular clients, recommended the place. Moon, the owner greeted me warmly and we had a nice chat before trying some tuxedos on and with his help and guidance, I was able to choose one that fitted my requirements perfectly. I must say, Sherwani King has a great selection of attire and staff is super helpful. The showroom is quite appealing with wide range of accessories and shoes aswell, which was bonus as I ended up buying a matching pair !! The appointments here are very personalised and welcoming. Throughout its been a great experience at Sherwani King. Highly recommend it.

I recently visited Sherwani King London store with my husband and I must admit I was highly impressed by the collection of sherwani they have. The staff was extremely friendly and made us feel comfortable, went through our needs in detail and helped us choose outfits for my husband.
The quality is extremely fine on fabric and embroidery, and we specifically liked that fact that they also offer a wide variety of accessories to go with outfits.
We highly recommend Sherwani King to everyone and will surely be going back to them in future.

What a wonderful experience it has been visiting the Sherwani King London store! After scouring Southall, South and East London we stumbled upon Sherwani King and I have to tell you that this is not your usual Asian High Street store.
We did not see the standard and design of the Sherwanis anywhere else.
The staff are lovely and professional. They make you feel comfortable and dont try to force sell you anything.
The best thing is that that they are by appointment only so your slot is exclusively yours and the staff give you their full attention.
We will be recommending Sherwani King to all of our family and friends.
